articles.title: World’s largest triceratops skeleton sells for $7.7M at auction - Fox Business
articles.description: The world’s largest triceratops skeleton sold at auction for $7.7 million in Paris on Thursday.
articles.content:
The world’s largest triceratops skeleton sold at auction for $7.7 million (6.6 million euros) on Thursday.
